io.micronaut.inject.writer

Class BeanDefinitionReferenceWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.inject.writer.AbstractClassFileWriter
      • io.micronaut.inject.writer.AbstractAnnotationMetadataWriter
        • io.micronaut.inject.writer.BeanDefinitionReferenceWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes

    @Internal
public class BeanDefinitionReferenceWriter
extends AbstractAnnotationMetadataWriter
    Writes the bean definition class file to disk.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    BeanDefinitionReference

        public java.lang.String getBeanDefinitionQualifiedClassName()
        Obtains the class name of the bean definition to be written. Java Annotation Processors need this information to create a JavaFileObject using a Filer.

        the class name of the bean definition to be written
